attr.title: LISA: The Bashful
attr.desc: Lisa the Bashful is a Fangame set in the lisa universe made by DoYouSellVHS
attr.desc_md: Lisa the Bashful is a Fangame set in the LISA universe made by DoYouSellVHS.
attr.inst:
download the game from gamejolt,https://gamejolt.com/games/Lisathebashful/430290 tested with Windows version. Copy all assets to the gamedata folder.

Note: This game is not ideal for devices with low resolution displays and/or absent joysticks.
attr.inst_md:
Download the game from [GameJolt](https://gamejolt.com/games/Lisathebashful/430290) (tested with Windows version). Copy all assets to the gamedata folder.

**Note:** This game is not ideal for devices with low resolution displays and/or absent joysticks.
